chirp_scan package

Submodules

chirp_scan.classic_algorithms_chirpscan module

class chirp_scan.classic_algorithms_chirpscan.MIIPS(z_arr, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, phase_type=None, chirp_parameters=None, **kwargs)

Bases: ClassicAlgorithmsBASE, RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN

The (improoved)-MIIPS Algorithm as described in A. Comin et al., Opt. Express 24, 2505-2512 (2016). Doesnt seem to work though.

calc_approximate_phase_individual(trace, measurement_info, descent_info)
update_individual(individual, phase_prime, measurement_info, descent_info)
step(descent_state, measurement_info, descent_info)
initialize_run(population)
class chirp_scan.classic_algorithms_chirpscan.Basic(z_arr, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, phase_type=None, chirp_parameters=None, **kwargs)

Bases: ClassicAlgorithmsBASE, RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN

The Basic Reconstruction Algorithm. Inherits from ClassicAlgorithmsBASE and RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN.

  1. Miranda et al., J. Opt. Soc. Am. B 34, 190-197 (2017)

None
update_pulse(signal_t_new, gate, phase_matrix, nonlinear_method, sk, rn)

Creates an updated guess for the pulse.

step(descent_state, measurement_info, descent_info)

Performs one iteration of the Basic Algorithm.

Parameters:

  • descent_state – Pytree,

  • measurement_info – Pytree,

  • descent_info – Pytree,

Returns:

tuple[Pytree, jnp.array], the updated descent state and the current errors

initialize_run(population)

Prepares all provided data and parameters for the reconstruction. Here the final shape/structure of descent_state, measurement_info and descent_info are determined.

Parameters:

population – Pytree, the initial guess as created by self.create_initial_population()

Returns:

tuple[Pytree, Callable], the initial descent state and the step-function of the algorithm.

class chirp_scan.classic_algorithms_chirpscan.GeneralizedProjection(z_arr, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, phase_type=None, chirp_parameters=None, **kwargs)

Bases: GeneralizedProjectionBASE, RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN

The Generalized Projection Algorithm for Chirp-Scans. Inherits from GeneralizedProjectionBASE and RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN.

calculate_Z_gradient_individual(signal_t, signal_t_new, population, phase_matrix, measurement_info, pulse_or_gate)

Calculates the Z-error gradient for an individual.

calculate_Z_newton_direction(grad, signal_t_new, signal_t, phase_matrix, descent_state, measurement_info, descent_info, full_or_diagonal, pulse_or_gate)

Calculates the Z-error newton direction for a population.

update_individual(individual, gamma, descent_direction, measurement_info, pulse_or_gate)

Updates an individual based on a descent direction and a step size.

class chirp_scan.classic_algorithms_chirpscan.PtychographicIterativeEngine(z_arr, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, pie_method='rPIE', phase_type=None, chirp_parameters=None, **kwargs)

Bases: PtychographicIterativeEngineBASE, RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN

The Ptychographic Iterative Engine (PIE) for Chirp-Scans. Inherits from PtychographicIterativeEngineBASE and RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN.

pie_method

None or str, specifies the PIE variant. Can be one of None, PIE, ePIE, rPIE.

reverse_transform_grad(signal, phase_matrix, measurement_info)

For Chirp-Scan the effects of the phase matrix have to be undone to obtain the actual PIE-direction.

calculate_PIE_descent_direction_m(signal_t, signal_t_new, phase_matrix_m, population, pie_method, measurement_info, descent_info, pulse_or_gate)

Calculates the PIE direction for a given shift.

update_individual(individual, gamma, descent_direction, measurement_info, pulse_or_gate)

Updates an individual based on a descent direction and a step size.

calculate_PIE_newton_direction(grad, signal_t, phase_matrix, measured_trace, population, local_or_global_state, measurement_info, descent_info, pulse_or_gate, local_or_global)

Calculates the PIE newton direction for a population.

Updates an individual based on a desent direction and a step size.

get_Z_gradient_individual(signal_t, signal_t_new, population, phase_matrix, measurement_info, pulse_or_gate)

Calculates the Z-error gradient for an individual.

Bases: DifferentialEvolutionBASE, RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN

The Differential Evolution Algorithm applied to Chirp-Scans. Inherits from DifferentialEvolutionBASE and RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN.

get_pulses_from_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)

Calls get_pulses_f_from_population()

class chirp_scan.general_algorithms_chirpscan.Evosax(delay, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, phase_type=None, chirp_parameters=None, **kwargs)

Bases: EvosaxBASE, RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN

The Evosax package utilized for pulse reconstruction from Chirp-Scans. Inherits from EvosaxBASE and RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN.

get_pulses_from_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)

Calls get_pulses_f_from_population()

class chirp_scan.general_algorithms_chirpscan.LSF(delay, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, phase_type=None, chirp_parameters=None, **kwargs)

Bases: LSFBASE, RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN

The LSF Algorithm applied to Chrip-Scans. Inherits from LSFBASE and RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN.

get_pulses_from_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)

Returns the pulse and gate population. Does not need to call get_pulses_f_from_population() since LSF works with discetized fields only.

convert_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)

Converts any population into a discretized one.

class chirp_scan.general_algorithms_chirpscan.AutoDiff(delay, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, phase_type=None, chirp_parameters=None, **kwargs)

Bases: AutoDiffBASE, RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN

The Optimistix package utilized for pulse reconstruction from Chirp-Scans. Inherits from AutoDiffBASE and RetrievePulsesCHIRPSCAN.

get_pulses_from_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)
make_pulse_from_individual(individual, measurement_info, descent_info, pulse_or_gate)

Evaluates a pulse/gate for an individual.
